name: Set of Two Ladderback Chairs by Figli di Sanguineti G.B. in Chiavari, Italy

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Elegant set of two ladderback chairs, manufactured by Figli di Sanguineti G.B. in Chiavari, Italy. These chairs, typical of the Italian design tradition, combine refined craftsmanship with a sleek, airy silhouette. The chairs feature a high, tapered backrest with horizontal slats and are made of warmly toned wood. The seats are upholstered in brown textured fabric, creating a timeless appearance. The craftsmanship and subtle details make these chairs a stylish addition to both modern and classic interiors. The chairs are in vintage condition with signs of use consistent with their age, without compromising the design or functionality. Dimensions: Height: ± 100 cm Width: ± 50 cm Depth: ± 42 cm Seat height: ± 38 cm Price for the set of two.
